[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input  logic [3:0] in,
    output logic [1:0] pos
);
    always @(*) begin
        casez (in)
            4'b0001: pos = 2'b00; // LSB
            4'b001?: pos = 2'b01;
            4'b01??: pos = 2'b10;
            4'b1???: pos = 2'b11; // MSB
            default: pos = 2'b00; // No bits set
        endcase
    end
endmodule
[DONE]

module TopModule (
    input  [3:0] in,
    output reg [1:0] pos
);
    always @(*) begin
        casez (in)
            4'b1???: pos = 2'b11; // Highest priority
            4'b01??: pos = 2'b10;
            4'b001?: pos = 2'b01;
            4'b0001: pos = 2'b00; // Lowest priority
            default: pos = 2'b00; // No bits set
        endcase
    end
endmodule
